publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1820 Bruce Crawford on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Committee Membership—That the Parliament agrees that— Charlie Gordon be appointed to replace Claire Baker as a member of the Audit Committee; Richard Baker be appointed to replace Michael McMahon as a member of the Equal Opportunities Committee; Patricia Ferguson be appointed to replace John Park as a member of the European and External Relations Committee; and Jackie Baillie be appointed to replace Richard Baker as a member of the Subordinate Legislation Committee.
